game.name: Monster Mahjong
game.description:
It is always great fun to try out new arcade challenges during your free time! Today we have brought to you a completely new online game where you have to clear the board from all the matching tiles. Is not pretty exciting, friends? Join Monster Mahjong and get ready to put your brainpower and puzzle-solving abilities to the test to make your win! The top of the screen will show you all the game details including level, score, and moves.

Try to be careful since this is a time-based game so you have to complete each level before the time runs out! Your objective in this cool html5 puzzle game is to click two same tiles to make them disappear from the board and be prepared to unlock the other tiles underneath. You would win only when you clear all of the tiles from the board. Simply click on them or tap on the matching two tiles to eliminate them from the screen in this fun monster-themed game!

Keep eliminating all the tiles until your board gets cleared! Try to finish all of the complex and tricky levels to grab all of the stars! When you complete the present level, click the ok button to reach to the advanced level. This fun monster theme puzzle challenge features awesome mahjong matching elements coupled with seamless gameplay and power-ups to reward you timely. Play this relaxing yet creepy arcade challenge alone or with your friends, no download required!

game.mobileControlKeys: TAP ON THE SAME IMAGES TO MAKE MATCH
game.webControlKeys: L-CLICK OF MOUSE ON THE SAME IMAGES TO MAKE MATCH
